markdown:
I'm so confused about people who harass emergency personnel, complain about parcel delivery vans or people who litter deep in the forest.

Do you want somebody to hold up your ambulance when you're dying? Do you never order something online? How are you willing to walk 1 hour into a forest, into actual hike territory time, only to pollute the same nature you're trying to enjoy?

I'm noticing these occurrences way too much to pin it on a handful of sociopaths.. there's just actual people who live like this.
